channel.title: [PI] Clicking an item to get a different item [PI]
channel.description: I was wondering how to make it to when you click an item such as a casket for example, the casket is taken away and substituted with a different item. Not at random though, you choose the item it is substituted as. I want the casket to give dice. So how do I make it to where when I click the casket, the casket is taken and dice is given?

item.title: [PI] Clicking an item to get a different item [PI]

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:
